entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
